days.text: Cloudy. Periods of rain. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Rain at first. Mist at first. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
